verses.verse: And I saw <S%G3708><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> coming <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> the key <S%G2807><s%> of the abyss <S%G12><s%> and a great <S%G3173><s%> chain <S%G254><s%> in his hand. <S%G5495><s%>

And he laid <S%G2902><s%> hold <S%G2902><s%> of the dragon, <S%G1404><s%> the serpent <S%G3789><s%> of old, <S%G744><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is the devil <S%G1228><s%> and Satan, <S%G4567><s%> and bound <S%G1210><s%> him for a thousand <S%G5507><s%> years, <S%G2094><s%>

and threw <S%G906><s%> him into the abyss, <S%G12><s%> and shut <S%G2808><s%> [it] and sealed <S%G4972><s%> [it] over <S%G1883><s%> him, so <S%G2443><s%> that he should not deceive <S%G4105><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%> any <S%G2089><s%> longer, <S%G2089><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the thousand <S%G5507><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> were completed; <S%G5055><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> he must <S%G1163><s%> be released <S%G3089><s%> for a short <S%G3398><s%> time. <S%G5550><s%>

And I saw <S%G3708><s%> thrones, <S%G2362><s%> and they sat <S%G2523><s%> upon them, and judgment <S%G2917><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> to them. And I [saw] the souls <S%G5590><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who had been beheaded <S%G3990><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and because <S%G1223><s%> of the word <S%G3056><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and those who <S%G3748><s%> had not worshiped <S%G4352><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%> or <S%G3761><s%> his image, <S%G1504><s%> and had not received <S%G2983><s%> the mark <S%G5480><s%> upon their forehead <S%G3359><s%> and upon their hand; <S%G5495><s%> and they came to life <S%G2198><s%> and reigned <S%G936><s%> with Christ <S%G5547><s%> for a thousand <S%G5507><s%> years. <S%G2094><s%>

The rest <S%G3062><s%> of the dead <S%G3498><s%> did not come to life <S%G2198><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the thousand <S%G5507><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> were completed. <S%G5055><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is the first <S%G4413><s%> resurrection. <S%G386><s%>

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> and holy <S%G40><s%> is the one who has <S%G2192><s%> a part <S%G3313><s%> in the first <S%G4413><s%> resurrection; <S%G386><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> power, <S%G1849><s%> but they will be priests <S%G2409><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and of Christ <S%G5547><s%> and will reign <S%G936><s%> with Him for a thousand <S%G5507><s%> years. <S%G2094><s%>
And when <S%G3752><s%> the thousand <S%G5507><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> are completed, <S%G5055><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> will be released <S%G3089><s%> from his prison, <S%G5438><s%>

and will come <S%G1831><s%> out to deceive <S%G4105><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%> which are in the four <S%G5064><s%> corners <S%G1137><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> Gog <S%G1136><s%> and Magog, <S%G3098><s%> to gather <S%G4863><s%> them together <S%G4863><s%> for the war; <S%G4171><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of them is like <S%G5613><s%> the sand <S%G285><s%> of the seashore. <S%G2281><s%>

And they came <S%G305><s%> up on the broad <S%G4114><s%> plain <S%G4114><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> and surrounded <S%G2943><s%> the camp <S%G3925><s%> of the saints <S%G40><s%> and the beloved <S%G25><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> and fire <S%G4442><s%> came <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from heaven <S%G3772><s%> and devoured <S%G2719><s%> them.

And the devil <S%G1228><s%> who deceived <S%G4105><s%> them was thrown <S%G906><s%> into the lake <S%G3041><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%> and brimstone, <S%G2303><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%> and the false <S%G5578><s%> prophet <S%G5578><s%> are also; <S%G2532><s%> and they will be tormented <S%G928><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> and night <S%G3571><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%>

And I saw <S%G3708><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> throne <S%G2362><s%> and Him who sat <S%G2521><s%> upon it, from whose <S%G3739><s%> presence <S%G4383><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> and heaven <S%G3772><s%> fled <S%G5343><s%> away, <S%G5343><s%> and no <S%G3756><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> was found <S%G2147><s%> for them.

And I saw <S%G3708><s%> the dead, <S%G3498><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> and the small, <S%G3398><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> and books <S%G975><s%> were opened; <S%G455><s%> and another <S%G243><s%> book <S%G975><s%> was opened, <S%G455><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is [the book] of life; <S%G2222><s%> and the dead <S%G3498><s%> were judged <S%G2919><s%> from the things which were written <S%G1125><s%> in the books, <S%G975><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to their deeds. <S%G2041><s%>

And the sea <S%G2281><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> up the dead <S%G3498><s%> which were in it, and death <S%G2288><s%> and Hades <S%G86><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> up the dead <S%G3498><s%> which were in them; and they were judged, <S%G2919><s%> every <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1538><s%> [of them] according <S%G2596><s%> to their deeds. <S%G2041><s%>

And death <S%G2288><s%> and Hades <S%G86><s%> were thrown <S%G906><s%> into the lake <S%G3041><s%> of fire. <S%G4442><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is the second <S%G1208><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> the lake <S%G3041><s%> of fire. <S%G4442><s%>

And if <S%G1487><s%> anyone's name was not found <S%G2147><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> in the book <S%G976><s%> of life, <S%G2222><s%> he was thrown <S%G906><s%> into the lake <S%G3041><s%> of fire. <S%G4442><s%>
